name: The History of Assasins (ArberZefi2)
description:
What is this game?

Its a singleplayer game.You are an Assasins an the Italian pirates that you have war kidnapped one of your partners Greg.He is a very strong guy and has skills but they have him in a big ship in the jails.You have to  fight all the italians pirates with whatever you find bow, gun, sword or even a rock!

                                                           HOW TO PLAY:

    Movement: WASD or up arrow, down arrow, left arrow, right arrow

    Pick Up:Its simple, you just touch them!

    Shoot:You just click with the mouse!

                                                        PRO TIPS   FOR THE GAME:

Shoot the cage to save your dog.

When u get down the trap shoot immediately so that you don't die .

Name your dog god of Greg lol.

    Thats it!Help me to do better games by downloading the game and even donate!
